page.shortlink: api client api a5 u object resolve get method

argument.name: settings
argument.description: The settings for the dynamic object.

property.name: onSyncComplete
property.description: Function to call when a dynamic object is synchronously retrieved.

property.name: onBeforeAsync
property.description: Function to call when a dynamic object is going to be asynchronously retrieved.

property.name: onAsyncComplete
property.description: Function to call when a dynamic object is asynchronously retrieved.

property.name: onComplete
property.description: Function to call when a dynamic object is retrieved.

argument.name: context
argument.description: The context with which to call all functions.

argument.name: arguments
argument.description: The optional additional arguments with which to call all functions. If no arguments are defined, then the settings will be passed in as the additional argument.

page.description: Get an object that may be statically (a plain object or array) or dynamically (a function) defined. A dynamically defined object can be optionally asynchronous, with each request getting a unique ID that can be used in conjunction with A5.u.object.dynamic.set.
